name: secrover
description: Secrover is a self-hosted travel and tour management system that includes booking, itinerary planning, and customer management through a modern web interface.
features: Booking management: Handle tour reservations, availability, and customer bookings.
Itinerary planning: Create detailed travel itineraries with activities, accommodations, and transport.
Customer database: Manage customer profiles, preferences, and booking history.
Payment tracking: Record payments, deposits, and outstanding balances for bookings.
Tour packages: Define reusable tour packages with pricing, inclusions, and schedules.
Calendar view: Visualize bookings and availability across dates and resources.
Document generation: Create invoices, vouchers, and booking confirmations automatically.
Multi-currency support: Handle international bookings with currency conversion.
Email notifications: Send automated booking confirmations and reminders to customers.
Reporting tools: Generate revenue, occupancy, and customer analytics reports.
Supplier management: Track relationships with hotels, transport providers, and vendors.
Custom fields: Add business-specific data fields to bookings and customer records.
